extDesc.message: Review the web addresses of all links in a draft message.

msgUnavail.message: The selected action is not available right now.

msgPlainTxt.message: Link checking is not available for plain-text messages.
msgPlainTxt.description: Message that appears when Check Links invoked on a plain-text message

msgNoLnks.message: Link checking is complete. No links were found.
msgNoLnks.description: Message that appears when Check Links invoked on a message with zero hyperlinks

msgDraftEdit.message: Links can't be updated because the draft message was modified while the Check Links dialog was open.
msgDraftEdit.description: Message that appears when user modified the message draft while Check Links dialog is open

btnMsgVw.description: Button in Check Links dialog for switching to message view

btnTblVw.description: Button in Check Links dialog for switching to table view

hlpMsgVwIntro.message: The Message View dialog lets you review the links in a draft email message one at a time. The currently-selected link is highlighted in the message preview.

hlpMsgVwHowto.message: If you want to change the address of the selected link, edit the text in the Link Address textbox and then click Replace.

hlpMsgVwHowToNext.message: If the link address is correct, click Next Link to review the next link in the message.

hlpMsgVwEnd.message: You can restart link checking at any time by clicking Start Over. To undo all changes, click Revert.

hlpTblVwIntro.message: The Table View dialog lets you review all the links of a draft message in a table.

hlpTblVwHowTo.message: If you want to change the address of a link, click on the table cell for the link address and edit the text.

hlpTblVwEnd.message: When you're done reviewing the links, click Update to apply your changes and close the dialog.

hlpLinkEg.message: Link addresses can be website URLs (for example, https://aecreations.io) or email addresses (for example, mailto:aecreations-help@groups.io).

mnuPrefs.description: Composer toolbar button context menu option for opening the extension preferences page

msgView.description: User-selectable option in extension preferences page

msgViewDesc.message: Show links in a message preview, where you can review them one at a time.

tblView.description: User-selectable option in extension preferences page

tblViewDesc.message: Show links in a table, where you can review all of them at a glance.

prefCxtMenu.message: Show menu item in the context menu
prefCxtMenu.description: Checkbox option in the extension preferences page

plchdlrEx.message: Example usage: Visit $1the website$2 to learn more.
